subject: Soccer
World Cup 2010 (Soccer)
Officiating (Sports)
lead_paragraph: The referee in the World Cup final said he should have given the Dutch midfielder Nigel de Jong a red card for his flying kick to Xabi Alonso’s chest in the first half.
snippet: The referee in the World Cup final said he should have given the Dutch midfielder Nigel de Jong a red card for his flying kick to Xabi Alonso’s chest in the first half.
